description:
Kelly Taylor and DJ decided to buy some livestock together to see if they could manage a small farm. When DJ arrives home from milking the cows, he's surprised to find his partner Kelly lounging around with a raging hard-on! After working all day, DJ could sure use some fun.

And Kelly's up for a little action too. It's not long before he's balls deep in DJ's mouth while the guys jam down on some hot 69ing. DJ has been thinking about a cock in his ass all day and Kelly can't wait to pound him proper. Watch these guys fuck by the fireplace and then get real kinky with some ride-em-cowboy, contortionist sex! You'll see what I mean. Giddy up!

Enjoy!
title: DJ & Kelly Taylor
